benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/customFields - Retrieve payment custom fields

covered: Valid Request: Scenarios cover successful retrieval with various audit levels and default behavior.
Empty Response: Tests cover no-custom-fields scenario and system states with no data.
Query Parameters: Tests include audit parameter variations, extra parameters ignored, and invalid/malformed inputs for audit.
Authorization: Tests include both missing and invalid authentication token scenarios (401).
Error Handling: Tests cover invalid format (400), non-existent resource (404), and dependency/service errors (502, 503).
Data Integrity/Consistency: Tests verify data after updates and ensure newly added fields appear in responses.
Performance/Scale: Tests include large number of fields (1000) and a dedicated performance test (response time and concurrency).
Backward/Regression: Tests cover backward-compatibility audit NONE case and regression for empty arrays.
gaps: Pagination: No tests covering API response pagination when data spans multiple pages.
Caching Behavior: No tests validating caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) or related caching behavior.
Rate Limiting: No tests validating throttling/rate-limit enforcement under load beyond concurrency scenario.
Authorization: No test for forbidden (403) path or token scope restrictions beyond basic 401 cases.

Edge-case Input Validation: While many invalid formats are tested, further edge cases such as whitespace-only IDs or extremely long IDs are not explicitly covered beyond trailing spaces and special chars.
recommendations: Add explicit pagination tests to verify page size, page tokens, and total counts when large datasets are returned.
Add tests for caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) and ensure correct behavior with conditional requests (If-None-Match).
Add rate-limiting/throttle tests under sustained load to verify stability and proper error response when limits are exceeded.
Add authorization scope/403 tests to cover access control when user/team lacks permission, not just missing/invalid tokens.
Enhance edge-case input validation tests for additional tricky inputs (e.g., whitespace-only IDs, extremely long IDs, exotic Unicode).
